summary: Rick is a small time drug dealer and bouncer in NYC, who's tired of the long string of one night stands and wants a lasting relationship. His 3 buddies are not looking for change.
cast: Vin Diesel|Joey Dedio|T.K. Kirkland|Mike Epps|F. Valentino Morales|Suzanne Lanza|Darnell Williams|Mihaela Kolich|Eugene Osborne Smith|Temple Brooks|Loni Sabrina Stuart|DeAngela Parrish|Marko Kalfa|Joey Iovino|Louis Albert Von Steidl|Sean M. Silverstein|Helen M. Mitchell|Freddie Pendavis|Denise Carrasco|Taquana Harris|Marlo Morales|Rudy 'Rush' McCallum|Marco Abularach|Gus Theodoro|Freddie Ricks|Red Grant|John Morales|Jamie Schutz|Matthew Michael Ross|Clynton Lamur|John Pierce|Phillip Jones|Gina Lombardino|Jennifer Merzius|Carol Ferrante|Natalie Ferrante|Munge Abraham Sheriff|Rash Pal Singh|Bartolo Cruz|Mohammed Salama|Brian Reingold
title: Strays
